title: Hornet

| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A buzzing hornet with a vicious stinger dripping with paralytic poison. |

## Useful Info

**Hornets** are a dangerous flying insect. In addition to [poison](/Poison "Poison"), their stings will [slow](/Slow "Slow") (always) and [paralyse](/Paralyse "Paralyse") (1/6 chance) you for 1-3 turns. Poison resistance only has a 66% chance to prevent the slow and paralysis; you need poison immunity to be safe.

They are often found in [the Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"), and can spawn via [vault](/Vault "Vault") placement in [Spider's Nest](/Spider%27s_Nest "Spider's Nest"). They can also be created when a [shambling mangrove](/Shambling_mangrove "Shambling mangrove") or [spriggan rider](/Spriggan_rider "Spriggan rider") is damaged sufficiently.

## Tips & Tricks

- Paralysis is always an *extremely* dangerous effect. If you are paralysed for 3 turns, hornets can attack you up to 5 times in a row, which can easily kill you (5 \* 18 = 80, not including poison itself). If you aren't immune to poison, you should take extreme caution with hornets. This isn't even mentioning the slow, which is a dangerous effect on its own.
- Hornets are poison vulnerable, so most poison effects work well. [Curare](/Curare "Curare") darts deal significant damage and slow the hornet to average speed. [Poisonous Vapours](/Poisonous_Vapours "Poisonous Vapours") or [Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud") are reliable ways to kill/disable a hornet, respectively. A [scroll of poison](/Scroll_of_poison "Scroll of poison") will prevent a hornet from charging at you, allowing you to hit it with ranged attacks.
- [Wands](/Wand "Wand") and other [evocables](/Evocable "Evocable") are also effective. Their [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") isn't great, so [paraysis](/Wand_of_paralysis "Wand of paralysis") and [polymorph](/Wand_of_polymorph "Wand of polymorph") can help deal with them. They aren't especially durable, so [iceblast](/Iceblast "Iceblast") and other attack wands might kill it.
- A [potion of lignification](/Potion_of_lignification "Potion of lignification") will give you poison resistance and high AC. It'll make death to a lone hornet extremely unlikely. Just watch out for other monsters in the vicinity.
- Never fight them in an area that allows you to be surrounded. Paralysis is bad enough when you only have to worry about one hornet.

## History

- In [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), hornets replaced [wasps](/Wasp "Wasp") and became more common. Also, they were slightly nerfed.
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), this monster was known as *red wasp*.
- Prior to [0.8](/0.8 "0.8"), their paralysis effect could stack. They were near-certain death to anyone stung without the proper defenses.
html:
Hornet

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all arthropods, see list of arthropods.

hornet y 
HP 21-44
HD 6
XP 281
Speed 15
AC 6
EV 14
Will 30
Attack1 18 (sting: paralyse)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities Poison
Habitat Land
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Tiny
Type hornet, hornet
Flags Flying
No skeleton
A buzzing hornet with a vicious stinger dripping with paralytic poison.

Useful Info

Hornets are a dangerous flying insect. In addition to poison, their stings will slow (always) and paralyse (1/6 chance) you for 1-3 turns. Poison resistance only has a 66% chance to prevent the slow and paralysis; you need poison immunity to be safe.

They are often found in the Dungeon, and can spawn via vault placement in Spider's Nest. They can also be created when a shambling mangrove or spriggan rider is damaged sufficiently.

Tips & Tricks

  • Paralysis is always an extremely dangerous effect. If you are paralysed for 3 turns, hornets can attack you up to 5 times in a row, which can easily kill you (5 * 18 = 80, not including poison itself). If you aren't immune to poison, you should take extreme caution with hornets. This isn't even mentioning the slow, which is a dangerous effect on its own.
  • Hornets are poison vulnerable, so most poison effects work well. Curare darts deal significant damage and slow the hornet to average speed. Poisonous Vapours or Mephitic Cloud are reliable ways to kill/disable a hornet, respectively. A scroll of poison will prevent a hornet from charging at you, allowing you to hit it with ranged attacks.
  • Wands and other evocables are also effective. Their willpower isn't great, so paraysis and polymorph can help deal with them. They aren't especially durable, so iceblast and other attack wands might kill it.
  • A potion of lignification will give you poison resistance and high AC. It'll make death to a lone hornet extremely unlikely. Just watch out for other monsters in the vicinity.
  • Never fight them in an area that allows you to be surrounded. Paralysis is bad enough when you only have to worry about one hornet.

History

  • In 0.19, hornets replaced wasps and became more common. Also, they were slightly nerfed.
  • Prior to 0.16, this monster was known as red wasp.
  • Prior to 0.8, their paralysis effect could stack. They were near-certain death to anyone stung without the proper defenses.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Hornet&oldid=78543"

==Useful Info==
'''Hornets''' are a dangerous flying insect. In addition to [[poison]], their stings will [[slow]] (always) and [[paralyse]] (1/6 chance) you for 1-3 turns. Poison resistance only has a 66% chance to prevent the slow and paralysis; you need poison immunity to be safe.

They are often found in [[the Dungeon]], and can spawn via [[vault]] placement in [[Spider's Nest]]. They can also be created when a [[shambling mangrove]] or [[spriggan rider]] is damaged sufficiently.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Paralysis is always an ''extremely'' dangerous effect. If you are paralysed for 3 turns, hornets can attack you up to 5 times in a row, which can easily kill you (5 * 18 = 80, not including poison itself). If you aren't immune to poison, you should take extreme caution with hornets. This isn't even mentioning the slow, which is a dangerous effect on its own.
*Hornets are poison vulnerable, so most poison effects work well. [[Curare]] darts deal significant damage and slow the hornet to average speed. [[Poisonous Vapours]] or [[Mephitic Cloud]] are reliable ways to kill/disable a hornet, respectively. A [[scroll of poison]] will prevent a hornet from charging at you, allowing you to hit it with ranged attacks.
*[[Wand]]s and other [[evocable]]s are also effective. Their [[willpower]] isn't great, so [[wand of paralysis|paraysis]] and [[wand of polymorph|polymorph]] can help deal with them. They aren't especially durable, so [[iceblast]] and other attack wands might kill it.
*A [[potion of lignification]] will give you poison resistance and high AC. It'll make death to a lone hornet extremely unlikely. Just watch out for other monsters in the vicinity.
*Never fight them in an area that allows you to be surrounded. Paralysis is bad enough when you only have to worry about one hornet.

==History==
*In [[0.19]], hornets replaced [[wasp]]s and became more common. Also, they were slightly nerfed.
*Prior to [[0.16]], this monster was known as ''red wasp''.
*Prior to [[0.8]], their paralysis effect could stack. They were near-certain death to anyone stung without the proper defenses.
